biolockj.util

Class OtuUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.util.OtuUtil

  • public class OtuUtil
extends Object
    This utility helps work with OTU count files as formatted by the ParserModule.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  OtuUtil.OtuCountLine
      This inner class is used to hold a signle line from an OTU count file.

      • findUniqueOtus

        public static TreeSet<String> findUniqueOtus(TreeMap<String,TreeMap<String,Long>> sampleOtuCounts)
                                      throws Exception
        Find every unique OTU across all samples.
        Parameters:
        sampleOtuCounts - TreeMap(SampleId, TreeMap(OTU, count)) OTU counts for every sample
        Returns:
        Ordered TreeSet of unique OTUs
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • getOtuCountFile

        public static File getOtuCountFile(File dir,
                                   String sampleId,
                                   String prefix)
                            throws Exception
        Build OTU count file using a standard format in the directory given.
        Format: pipeline_name + prefix + "otuCount" + sampleId + ".tsv"
        Parameters:
        dir - File directory
        sampleId - Sample ID
        prefix - File prefix (after pipeline name)
        Returns:
        OTU count file
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • getSampleId

        public static String getSampleId(File otuCountFile)
                          throws Exception
        Extract the sampleId from the OTU count file name.
        Input files should include a file name just before the .tsv file extension.
        Parameters:
        otuCountFile - "otuCount" file
        Returns:
        Sample ID
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • getSampleOtuCounts

        public static TreeMap<String,TreeMap<String,Long>> getSampleOtuCounts(Collection<File> files)
                                                               throws Exception
        TreeMap OTU counts for each sample file formatted and named as in ParserModule output.
        Parameters:
        files - Collection of OTU count files
        Returns:
        TreeMap(SampleID, TreeMap(OTU, count)) OTU counts by sample
        Throws:
        Exception - if any of the input file names are missing "_"otuCount"_"

      • isOtuFile

        public static boolean isOtuFile(File file)
                         throws Exception
        Check the file name and contents to determine if file is an OTU count file.
        Parameters:
        file - File
        Returns:
        boolean TRUE if file is an OTU count file
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur
